Container.Name: SurfSense - Frontend
Container.Overview: Open Source Alternative to NotebookLM / Perplexity / Glean, connected to external sources such as search engines (Tavily, Linkup), Slack, Linear, Notion, YouTube, GitHub, Discord and more. [br] This is the frontend container.
Container.Category: AI: MediaApp:Other Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: notebooklm llm perplexity glean ai search engine slack linear notion youtube github discord podcast notes text corpus
Container.Changes:
### 2025-10-22
Add missing environmental variables
### 2025-06-05
Initial release
Container.Requires: Requires separate SurfSense - Backend, SurfSense - Worker, pgAdmin4, pgvector and Redis containers. See documentation: https://github.com/MODSetter/SurfSense/blob/main/DOCKER_SETUP.md#deployment-options

Config.Name: Backend - URL
Config.Description: URL of the backend service, including port

Config.Name: Backend - URL
Config.Description: URL of the FastAPI backend service, including port. Should match other Backend URL.

Config.Name: Backend - Authentication Type
Config.Description: Authentication type used by the backend.

Config.Name: Backend - ETL Service
Config.Description: Document parsing service used by the backend.
